newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia consumer prices fell 0.2 pct in Aug.
newsitem.headline: Russia consumer prices fell 0.2 pct in Aug.

text.p: Russian consumer price fell 0.2 percent in August, after a rise of 0.7 percent in July, the State Statistics Committee said on Wednesday.
It was the first time prices had fallen since economic reforms began in 1992.
RUSSIAN CONSUMER PRICES AUG 96 JUL 96 AUG 95
Prices fell in the week ending August 30 by 0.1 percent, the Committee said.
The committee said prices had risen 16.1 percent since the beginning of the year. If August prices trends continued, year-on-year inflation in December could be 15 percent, it said.
RUSSIAN CONSUMER PRICES w/e Aug 30 w/e Aug 26
